医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
立体定向放射治疗为患有无法手术的肾癌的老年人带来了新的希望澳大利亚和荷兰研究人员的一项新研究表明，被诊断患有不适合手术的肾脏肿瘤的老年人可能会受益于有针对性的高剂量放射。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Stereotropic-radiation-therapy-offers-new-hope-for-older-adults-with-inoperable-kidney-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Stereotropic-radiation-therapy-offers-new-hope-for-older-adults-with-inoperable-kidney-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0485507d-dc66-4746-a3e3-c89ce5ee36b0 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 14:13:01 -0400 Stereotactic radiation therapy offers new hope for older adults with inoperable kidney cancer
研究发现粮食不安全与严重低血糖之间存在联系在德国汉堡举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会上（10 月 2 日至 6 日）公布的新研究发现，在难以负担食物的成人糖尿病患者中，严重低血糖的发生率是其两倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Study-finds-link- Between-food-insecurity-and-severe-hypoglycemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Study-finds-link- Between-food-insecurity-and-severe-hypoglycemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a02b9f19-862a-4aaa-a24b-6feea6afa21a Tue, 03 Oct 2023 14:04:36 -0400 Study finds link between food insecurity and severe hypoglycemia
降低 HbA1c 阈值可能有助于 50 岁以下女性 2 型糖尿病的早期诊断和治疗将于今年在德国汉堡举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会（10 月 2 日至 6 日）上公布并发表在《糖尿病治疗》杂志上的新研究表明，2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 的诊断阈值）对于 50 岁以下的女性应降低，因为月经期间的自然失血可能会影响她们的血糖管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Lower-HbA1c-threshold-could-lead-to-earlier-diagnosis-treatment-of-type-2-diabetes-in-women-under-50。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Lower-HbA1c-threshold-could-lead-to-earlier-diagnosis-treatment-of-type-2-diabetes-in-women-under-50。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=537e2486-b49a-4d24-aaf7-b8d37ccd9fb4 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 13:58:11 -0400 Lower HbA1c threshold could lead to earlier diagnosis, treatment of type 2 diabetes in women under 50
MR-linac 系统可以帮助临床医生区分胶质母细胞瘤的真实进展与假性进展肿瘤生长是真进展还是假进展？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/MR-linac-systems-could-help-clinicians-distinguish-true-progression-from-pseudoprogression-in-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/MR-linac-systems-could-help-clinicians-distinguish-true-progression-from-pseudoprogression-in-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db83f118-9f56-4cdb-b4ab-7dc8eeb06034 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 13:50:11 -0400 MR-linac systems could help clinicians distinguish true progression from pseudoprogression in glioblastoma
即使执行相同的动作，大脑活动也会根据环境而变化站在人行横道上，信号灯从“请勿步行”变为“步行”。您可能会立即走到街上，也可能会在过马路之前向两边看。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Brain-activity-changes-depending-on-context-even-when-performing-the-same-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Brain-activity-changes-depending-on-context-even-when-performing-the-same-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=412d732d-42cb-44b8-ba39-0b2fb1936d92 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 13:44:33 -0400 Brain activity changes depending on context, even when performing the same action
研究表明，较短疗程的放射治疗对中危前列腺癌同样有效一项新的 III 期随机试验表明，患有中等风险的局限性前列腺癌的患者可以在五个疗程中使用更少和更高剂量的放射治疗，与在几周内进行较低剂量的放射治疗一样有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Shorter-course-of-radiation-therapy-just-as- effective-for-intermediate-risk-prostate-cancer-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Shorter-course-of-radiation-therapy-just-as- effective-for-intermediate-risk-prostate-cancer-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3323fa8b-12ae-4ced-8e54-cb6eb25d616b Tue, 03 Oct 2023 13:32:55 -0400 Shorter course of radiation therapy just as effective for intermediate risk prostate cancer, study shows
新的分析工具可以治愈特发性肺纤维化弗吉尼亚大学工程与应用科学学院的一个研究小组利用一种在实验室中从活体肺组织中生长血管的新方法，开发出了一种分析工具，可以治愈特发性肺纤维化（IPF），这是一种肺纤维化疾病。消灭疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/New-analytical-tool-could-lead-to-a-cure-for-idiopathic-pulmonary-fibrosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/New-analytical-tool-could-lead-to-a-cure-for-idiopathic-pulmonary-chemistry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbfbf443-a7e0-421e-8c1f-733e2577c783 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 13:25:37 -0400 New analytical tool could lead to a cure for idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis
由 Dimension 和 AP Moller Holding 支持的 4000 万美元融资，用于扩大不断增长的生命科学实验室自动化产品一家为生命科学实验室提供支持的领先自动化公司已筹集 4000 万美元，以加速其在美国、英国和欧洲、中东和非洲地区的快速增长和行业影响力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/2440m-fundraise-backed-by-Dimension-and-AP-Moller-Holding-to-expand-grinding-life-science-lab-automation-offering。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/2440m-fundraise-backed-by-Dimension-and-AP-Moller-Holding-to-expand-grinding-life-science-lab-automation-offering。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d906ba3f-2d31-4935-8f26-3b82ffab1ceb Tue, 03 Oct 2023 10:37:00 -0400 $40m fundraise backed by Dimension and A.P. Moller Holding, to expand growing life science lab automation offering
冠状血管中的 SARS-CoV-2 感染与心血管并发症有关研究人员报告说，与 COVID-19 相关的急性心血管并发症的长期风险增加与 SARS-CoV-2 感染冠状血管并诱导斑块形成有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/SARS-CoV-2-infection-in-coronary-vessels-linked-to-cardioangio-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/SARS-CoV-2-infection-in-coronary-vessels-linked-to-cardioangio-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6f3e0a5-d648-4c59-9f2a-ae3080938a41 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 08:00:00 -0400 SARS-CoV-2 infection in coronary vessels linked to cardiovascular complications
打破慢性背痛的循环：新研究揭示了改变疼痛信念的力量研究人员检查了疼痛处理疗法是否可以缓解疼痛并有助于改善康复过程，这种疗法涉及将疼痛重新归因于大脑或心灵的过程，而不是表明组织损伤或损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Breaking-the-cycle-of-chronic-back-pain-new-study-reveals-the-power-of-shifting-pain-beliefs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Breaking-the-cycle-of-chronic-back-pain-new-study-reveals-the-power-of-shifting-pain-beliefs.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28e2a68e-ee87-45b3-b4d2-da2f515c8332 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 07:29:00 -0400 Breaking the cycle of chronic back pain: new study reveals the power of shifting pain beliefs
